info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 6:25PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Allen County through 700 PM EDT... At 625 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles west of Fort Wayne, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fort Wayne, New Haven and Huntertown. This includes the following highways... Interstate 469 between mile markers 15 and 30. Interstate 69 in Indiana between mile markers 300 and 320. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
